label: Description
value: A mother is seated with her child in her arms, right. At the left, a seated elderly couple. Garden setting; a figure leans over a wall in the left background.

label: Provenance
value: Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt; 1931: acquired by Museum

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description

A Naiad (Woman Stepping into a Bath)

label: Description
value: A woman balanced at the edge of a bath, about to enter, Her right foot is on the urn, which is pouring in the water. Below, the artists' and publisher's names, date of sculpture, date and place of publication, title and inscription.

label: Provenance
value: Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt; 1931: acquired by Museum

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
Three Cupids, One with a Wreath of Flowers

label: Description
value: Three cupids gambol in the clouds. One sits, center, holding the wreath of flowers over his head. Below, to the left, another is asleep, his quiver beside him. The third, right, has his bow in his left hand. Below, the artists' names.

label: Provenance
value: Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt; 1931: acquired by Museum

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description
value: An oval (vertical) on a horizontal rectangular stone, painted to show: a muse sitting on rock, at her feet shepherds' pipes and the mask of tragedy under the right foot. She holds the comic mask aloft as cupid, right, tries to reach it, over a lyre. The Dionysiac staff lies across her lap (perhaps Melpomene, the Muse of Tragedy).

label: Provenance
value: Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt; 1931: acquired by Museum

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description
value: Drawing of the exterior of the Musée de Cluny, Paris, with courtyard and tower, at left, and trees, at right.

label: Physical description
value: Graphite and black pastel on paper

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
Design for Stained Glass Memorial Window to Thomas J. Post

label: Description
value: Vertical rectangle depicting an angel that holds a torch in his right hand, and rests his left hand on a shield bearing the inscription: "THOM. J. POST AT REST AFTER A LONG LIFE OF INDUSTRY THRIFT AND SOBRIETY".
